name: part_010
file: tmp_【チラ見せ枠・夜公演】SorAZ Major Debut Live『First Gravity』【 #SorAZGravity 】【ホロライブ ⧸ ときのそら ⧸ AZKi 】 [7oFSKRxKu7A]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_010.mov

scenes.description: SorAZ performs their song 'Gravity' on stage.
MC section where Tokino Sora and AZKi greet the audience and talk about the evening performance.

subtitles.original: NOVAは必然
subtitles.english: A nova is inevitable

subtitles.original: 君も気づいてるのかな
subtitles.english: I wonder if you've noticed too

subtitles.original: 遥か宇宙から見た僕らは
subtitles.english: Looking from deep space, we are...

subtitles.original: まるでちっぽけな星屑
subtitles.english: ...just like tiny stardust.

subtitles.original: 君と出会えた瞬間に
subtitles.english: At the moment I met you,

subtitles.original: 僕ら星座になれたの
subtitles.english: we were able to become a constellation.

subtitles.original: 時間(とき)を越えて Non-Stop 未来へ
subtitles.english: Transcending time, non-stop to the future,

subtitles.original: 二つ重なって超絶ミラクル
subtitles.english: the two overlapping are a transcendent miracle.

subtitles.original: 誰も止められない魔法
subtitles.english: A magic that no one can stop,

subtitles.original: レベチな僕らの銀河パーティーナイト
subtitles.english: our next-level galaxy party night.

subtitles.original: Wow Wow 二人は Destiny
subtitles.english: Wow, wow, we are destiny.

subtitles.original: 引力に惹かれ光る COMEDY
subtitles.english: A comedy shining, pulled by gravity.

subtitles.original: ドキドキして愛して
subtitles.english: Heart pounding, love me,

subtitles.original: ワクワクして二人のグラビティ
subtitles.english: feeling excited, our gravity.

subtitles.original: 感情のままに So Dance Music
subtitles.english: Let the emotions flow, so dance music.

subtitles.original: 擦れ違いも待って狂い
subtitles.english: Even misunderstandings, wait and go crazy,

subtitles.original: 始めようぜ僕らの Gravity
subtitles.english: let's start our gravity.

subtitles.original: 見つめてて 朝が来るまで Yeah!
subtitles.english: Keep watching until morning comes, yeah!

subtitles.original: これが完全無欠なイリュージョン
subtitles.english: This is a flawless illusion,

subtitles.original: まさに完璧なフュージョン
subtitles.english: truly a perfect fusion.

subtitles.original: 歌い踊ればソリューション
subtitles.english: Singing and dancing is the solution,

subtitles.original: ここは僕たちのリージョン
subtitles.english: this is our region.

subtitles.original: みんなの力が重なり広がる
subtitles.english: Everyone's power overlaps and spreads out,

subtitles.original: たった一つのユニバース
subtitles.english: to a single universe.

subtitles.original: ねえ ちょっと泣いたって
subtitles.english: Hey, even if you cry a little,

subtitles.original: 明日は晴れる Take it easy
subtitles.english: tomorrow will be sunny, so take it easy.

subtitles.original: 一人でいないで Hold on
subtitles.english: Don't be alone, hold on,

subtitles.original: つながるいつでも未来で Let me out
subtitles.english: connecting anytime in the future, let me out.

subtitles.original: Wow Wow 二人のシンパシー
subtitles.english: Wow, wow, our sympathy.

subtitles.original: 求め合う鼓動が今 Bumping
subtitles.english: Our seeking heartbeats are bumping now,

subtitles.original: 見逃さないで 感じて
subtitles.english: don't miss it, feel it,

subtitles.original: 悟り込みになって これぞインフィニティ
subtitles.english: get enlightened, this is infinity.

subtitles.original: 考える前に Just doing
subtitles.english: Just doing it before thinking,

subtitles.original: 自分でも怖い声で
subtitles.english: with a voice that's scary even to myself.

subtitles.original: これからが僕らの Gravity
subtitles.english: From now on, it's our gravity,

subtitles.original: ついてきて たどり着くまで Yeah!
subtitles.english: follow us until we reach it, yeah!

subtitles.original: 何回でも星座を作るよ
subtitles.english: I'll create constellations over and over again.

subtitles.original: 二人で Six-bundle of stars
subtitles.english: The two of us, a six-bundle of stars.

subtitles.original: 描いてた未来へ
subtitles.english: Towards the future we envisioned.

subtitles.original: Wow Wow 二人は Destiny
subtitles.english: Wow, wow, we are destiny.

subtitles.original: 強くなる絆はまだ Growing
subtitles.english: The bond that grows stronger is still growing.

subtitles.original: ドキドキして愛して
subtitles.english: Heart pounding, love me,

subtitles.original: ワクワクして二人のグラビティ
subtitles.english: feeling excited, our gravity.

subtitles.original: 間違いだらけでも Oh my
subtitles.english: Even if it's full of mistakes, oh my,

subtitles.original: 凄まじくてもまた狂い
subtitles.english: even if it's terrifying, going crazy again,

subtitles.original: 始めようぜ僕らの Gravity
subtitles.english: let's start our gravity.

subtitles.original: 見つめてて 朝が来るまで Yeah!
subtitles.english: Keep watching until morning comes, yeah!

subtitles.original: First Gravity
subtitles.english: First Gravity

subtitles.original: そらとものみんなー！
subtitles.english: Everyone, Soratomo!

subtitles.original: こんそらー！
subtitles.english: Konsora!

subtitles.original: こんあずきー！
subtitles.english: Kon-Azuki!

subtitles.original: 二人合わせて、せーの、SorAZです！
subtitles.english: Together, one, two, we are SorAZ!

subtitles.original: みんなありがとう。ということで、SorAZ Major Debut Live『First Gravity』at CLUB CITTA' 夜公演にお越しいただきありがとうございます。
subtitles.english: Thank you, everyone. And so, thank you for coming to the SorAZ Major Debut Live "First Gravity" at CLUB CITTA' evening performance.

subtitles.original: みんな盛り上がってますかー？
subtitles.english: Is everyone pumped up?

subtitles.original: 全力で楽しんでますかー？
subtitles.english: Are you enjoying yourselves to the fullest?

subtitles.original: 全方位見えてるよー。
subtitles.english: I can see everyone in every direction.

subtitles.original: コメントも見えてるよー。
subtitles.english: I can see the comments too.

subtitles.original: あ、配信のみんなも見えてるよー。ありがとう。
subtitles.english: Ah, I can see everyone on the stream too. Thank you.

subtitles.original: いやー、夜公演だよ。夜公演やってきましたね。
subtitles.english: Wow, it's the evening performance. The evening performance has finally arrived.

subtitles.original: 夕方だー。
subtitles.english: It's evening.

subtitles.original: 夕方だ。でもだんだん日が暮れていくから夜公演だ。はい。
subtitles.english: It's evening. But the sun will gradually set, so it's the evening performance. Yes.

subtitles.original: あ、お水おいしいタイム。
subtitles.english: Ah, it's the 'water is delicious' time.

subtitles.original: おいしかった。おいしかった。
subtitles.english: It was delicious. It was delicious.

subtitles.original: またみんなの力で甘くなったわ。ありがとう。
subtitles.english: It's become sweet again thanks to everyone's power. Thank you.

subtitles.original: みんなの力でそらちゃんの水が甘くなっておりますが。
subtitles.english: So Sora-chan's water is becoming sweet thanks to everyone's power...

subtitles.original: ということで、そういえば、じゃあちょっと聞きたいことがあるんですけど。
subtitles.english: Anyway, that reminds me, there's something I want to ask.

subtitles.original: みんな、昼公演に...
subtitles.english: Did everyone... the afternoon performance...
